About Me

Hi. I am Mehmet, a full-stack web developer from Austin, TX.

BIO

I've always loved building things and putting things back together. Although my professional path has taken a slight twist from electrical engineering to software development, my passion about technology hasn't changed a bit.

As a web developer, my goal is to build high quality responsive websites. As a human, my ultimate mission is to create things that make a positive impact on millions of people.
